answers.answer: Did he tell you to alot of drink water? I went to the er and the founs blood in mine urine i was having cramps and right side lower back pain and to come to find out i had kidney stones and a yeast infection.. i was prescribed pills and the next week when i went to the doctors i was fine:)
When I was about 22 weeks they found blood in my urine also.. I Wasnt cramping or anything. But it was a uti & after I took the meds he gave me i was fine. & he told me to drink lots of water
Im 37weeks & 5 days , im in so much pain on my right side in my ribs its so sore , and im getting cramps all through my stomach
Possibly early labor. Those are all my symptoms and im spotting and my dr says im in the early stages of labor. But idk im only 33 weeks as of today
Could be uti..did he get your urine tested?
Yes I went to the hospital yesterday because I was in so much pain , no uti ): so idk whats going on
Pain in the right side just below your ribs could be a sign of preeclampsia because that's where your liver is, I hope they checked for that!
You are having classic signs of a urinary tract or kidney infection.  Call your doctor about this!!
Uti get treated . if it goes untreated it becomes very painful and may travel and become a kidney infection

question: Went to the doctors today & he said they found blood in my urine , he's acting like its not a big deal but im freaking out , my back is hurting really bad & im having small contractions ?
title: Found Blood In My Urine ?
